currentItem.name: JavaScript
currentItem.subTitle: The Programming language of the web
currentItem.description: JavaScript is mainly run in the browser, but can run on servers and any other place today.

parts.title: Connecting HTML and JavaScript
parts.description:
To insert JavaScript code in an HTML page we use the <script> tag.
The two options are to write the JavaScript code inside the tag or link to a JavaScript file with a url.
